title: Blended Learning Course on Electroconvulsive Therapy (ECT) for Treating Geriatric Depression

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical training for corporate mental health management role-holders.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three clinical features of geriatric depression and criteria for applying Electroconvulsive Therapy (ECT).
Demonstrate the ECT treatment protocol (preparation, implementation, post-management) step-by-step
Analyze real-world cases and make appropriate treatment decisions using a smartphone-based online module

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
